column9: sons]] in the north of [[Valinor]], built after his banishment from [[Tirion]]. A great number of the [[Noldor]], including their king [[Finwë]], went with Fëanor into exile.<ref>{{S

column1: Fëanor's treasury was in Formenos, and [[Morgoth
column2: Melkor]] came to the stronghold searching for the [[Silmarils]]. Here he slew Finwë before stealing the jewels and escaping to [[Middle-earth]].<ref>{{S

column1: Formenos means "Northern Fortress" in [[Quenya]] (from ''[[formen]]'' = "north" and ''[[osto]]'' = "fortress").  Its [[Sindarin]] cognate is ''[[Fornost]]'', the name of a different city.
